name: Cobra Slayer Epic battles!
description:
Arrow keys to move, A to equip and SPACE to attack 1st, 2 to do finisher. Enjoy these epic battles with the cobra slayer!

Creator/s: Ricky and Xander . Drawings: Xander Coding: Ricky Story: Xander and Ricky . Backrounds: Ricky.

Big thanks to Paul Taylor with his coding expertise!
